name: Wisely Chosen (bighead3211)
description:
A low quality game about choosing your RNG wisely to try and survive as long as you can. Once the big dice are introduced, you'll be put against what abilities you've chosen. You may have a kit that works well in your favor, but at the same time you've also picked out your own poison.

Controls:
  • WSD to move
  • Space to jump/double jump
  • Click to use certain abilities (like the AR and missile)
  • Q to roll dice

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

my first itch.io project :)
